text:
Viivi Altonen (born 1996) is a Finnish model and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss Supranational Finland 2019 and Miss Universe Finland 2020.
Early life.
Altonen is currently a model with BIBA model management in Zurich.
Pageantry.
Altonen was crowned Miss Supranational Finland 2019 pageant and she represented her country at Miss Suprational 2019 in Poland, but unplaced. Altonen joined Miss Finland 2020 pageant on September 19, 2020 and was crowned as Miss Universe Finland 2020. As Miss Finland, Altonen represented Finland at Miss Universe 2020.
